title: janggernaut
author: janggernaut
created_time: October 26, 2022, 02:01:28 PMLast edit: October 27, 2022, 02:16:37 PM by janggernaut
content: Hello,I'm looking for someone who  know or familar with altcoin contract address,  and about its transaction (Whats in the contract address? Where he sent the money? From where that address get money, etc etc.)The payment is $50 in BTC, but i might increase it up to $100 if i feel satisfied with your explanation.The method is simple, if you are interested, reply on here/pm me, then i will give you the contract address & blockchain transaction and you need to find all information from that, then i will ask the questions , and  i will pay once i feel satisfied after you have answered my all questions.For your safety, i will use escrow, and i ask DireWolfM14's help to become the escrow. He will confirm on this thread with the money i have sent to him. Don't worry, i will pay the escrow fee.For transparency, we will use pm on here (bitcointalk) for every question and you must reply to me & DirewolfM14, so he can review the conversation as well (don't reply  to me only, you must use reply all).P.S Please , don't apply if you don't know or familar with altcoin contract address or the transaction, you will be only wasting our time.Thank you

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Confirming that I am holding the payment for this service.bc1qgkaalsvm5sl2ykymaq5ta4jf7rlf7a98arfqr3Code:-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA256October 26, 2022DireWolfM14 providing escrow address for janggernautBTC address: bc1qgkaalsvm5sl2ykymaq5ta4jf7rlf7a98arfqr3-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE----------END PGP SIGNATURE-----

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: janggernaut on October 26, 2022, 02:01:28 PM~snip~Whoever you find please let me know a feedback about him. I will be needing someone for the same kind of work. By the way good luck finding the right guy.

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 26, 2022, 02:25:52 PMQuote from: janggernaut on October 26, 2022, 02:01:28 PM~snip~Whoever you find please let me know a feedback about him. I will be needing someone for the same kind of work. By the way good luck finding the right guy.Sure no problem! Thank you for kind words. I will post my opinion from people who have applied

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: I would like to give it a try. Please send me the questions on a PM and i will send the answers to both of you on PM.To get all the data from the smart contract i will use tools like https://bscscan.com/ or https://etherscan.io/ I hope i can be able to provide the right information that you are looking for.Tracking people with the address isn't always possible, and not sure if that's the goal, better let's talk all that in private.

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.created_time: October 26, 2022, 08:47:31 PMLast edit: October 27, 2022, 02:18:39 PM by janggernaut
comments.body: I will lock this thread for a while as there are 2 people applied already. Will open it again, either looking for new people or end it if i already get the answer.Update: This thread is ended, as i've got the answer from@seoincorporation's investigation, if you want to use his skills for finding similar thing like i did, i can vouch him.Now, just need to wait @DireWolfM14 release the money to @seoincorporation

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: janggernaut on October 26, 2022, 08:47:31 PMUpdate: This thread is ended, as i've got the answer from@seoincorporation's investigation, if you want to use his skills for finding similar thing like i did, i can vouch him.Now, just need to wait @DireWolfM14 release the money to @seoincorporationseoincorporation's responses were quite detailed and informed.  I agree that he's a good resource for investigating smart contracts of this type, and I will also vouch for him.  The funds have been released, thank you both for making this an easy deal.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: janggernaut on October 26, 2022, 08:47:31 PMUpdate: This thread is ended, as i've got the answer from@seoincorporation's investigation, if you want to use his skills for finding similar thing like i did, i can vouch him.Good that you got the investigation completed in quick time.However, i would suggest or request that if the information provided is not sensitive and private, can you make public what was required and what data did  @seoincorporation's investigation produced? Maybe it would be helpful for others to know what detailed information can we get from bscscan and etherscan.io ?

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on October 27, 2022, 05:18:29 PMHowever, i would suggest or request that if the information provided is not sensitive and private, can you make public what was required and what data did  @seoincorporation's investigation produced? Maybe it would be helpful for others to know what detailed information can we get from bscscan and etherscan.io ?It's not sensitive, i was just asked him to check an altcoin contract address and few of the recent transaction and yeah, it was on binance smart chain, so seoincorporation has used bscscan and other tools to check the transactions.Update. @DireWolfM14 has released the money to @seoincorporation and i've paid the escrow fee to @DireWolfM14. Will lock this thread 24 hours from now, just in case people want ask something else.
